overview: Longhaul is a documentary about a corruption that spreads across America, from one coast to another, and it is a corruption that you, the Reader of this statement, are apart of. In this documentary Joe Brown, a truck driver, exposes how every OTR(Over The Road) driver is forced to break the law every single day in order to make a living. And, these laws are not small laws, they are serious laws.
title: Longhaul
